The best child specialist we have known. Very lively, humourous and intelligent. Trustworthy and faithful. He will give you the best advice.
With tremendous experience.

review:
** ** **** ******* ** *** ********* ** ****** * ********** ***** ****** ** ** ******* ****** we have to rush to the hospital in emergency when my boy heart was functioning only 7%. Moreover, he didn't pick the phone when needed most. My child was having coarctation of the Aorta and we ask Mr Sehgal to have a echo but straightaway denied to have it.  


For the sake of your newborn,I recommend others not to visit this doctor.
Regards,
Amit Gupta
